content: hi stopping by as requested by @Tim Abbott in this github ticket #20821. I have a running public facing instance that replicates the bug if that helps at all.
Great; @Mateusz Mandera is the expert on this and should be able to help debug.
I managed to get it working by changing "auto_signup": False in settings.py. I don't think auto_signup: True works if you aren't invited.

Yeah, auto_signup is not supposed to bypass the invitation requirement if the organization has that setting. It's only for skipping the "Do you want to create a new account?" page that can sometimes be a somewhat useless, redundant step
